channel.title: Meeting
channel.description:
There will be a staff meeting, to discuss multiple matters. I advise you attend so you can add your own views/points to the discussion. The topics which we go through are usually just random but I hope to cover:
[ul][li]PVP[/li][li]Multiple worlds[/li][li]Stuff discussed in general (e.g awards)[/li][/ul]
So basically everything that has been happening recently. A live discussion gets through a lot more than any forum topic/posts can, let me assure you of that. I'll post a time I'm comfortable with and we can all work on a time that suits us all.
I'm fine with 4PM - 9PM GMT
It will take place on #moparcraft

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Oh well, try to be at the next one

Anyway, still waiting for things to be done I did try and get Mopman to do it (hahahha) but he’s just lazy and wouldn’t so I changed the topic on the irc.mitb.xxx IRC to PM Mopman for help

That’ll teach him to be lazy once all the people from Moparscape join.

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Oh wow, I missed this. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yeah >.>

Now you’ve gone on holiday the only ones here are me, Davidi2, and Moparisthebest.

I’d just like to add that (shockingly) I am starting to prefer building over PVP

It’s been a thing I’ve been meaning to say for a while I just wasn’t sure if it was a short phase but in truth I haven’t PVPed for a while now I just used my reputation from W1 to keep people in line on W2 but now xx matty xx has gone (which is probably a good thing).

I’d also like to say a few things about me and matty, pretty much all of you see out friendship together as one to dominate but I also kept the friendship going so I could have an insight into what his next move was, because I kept it going and kept arguing with Davidi2 I was able to give key information and names about hacking attempts and stop him from trying it again. (such as: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,511669.0.html)

I was able to provide information on a server crasher for minecraft he created and intended to use via uni computers and stop him from carrying that out, and the list goes on.

It’s probably a good thing he’s gone for good.

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

IS TONIGHT THE NIGHT BABY?

But yeah, is tonight the meeting or what, forum isn’t even in my timezone so I’m confused as to what time it is in Moparisthebestland.

But yeah, I’m on the IRC 24/7 as well so just highlight me.

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Offtopic but have any of you tried buildcraft mod? It’s insane. Not really feasible for Moparcraft; or multiplayer for that matter, but it’s pretty intense :o

YouTube

SpaceToadCraft

This channel is about showing latest developments on the projects I'm working on.

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I am on IRC 24/7 (and have been for around a year or two), I’m active (or at least at the computer) around 8-10 hours a day or so. I tend to forget I’m on it though, so you may want to PM me around 15-30 minutes or so before you start, or if I’m at the PC at that time I’ll just reply immediately

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

When you’re back feel free to come on any time between 3PM-8PM GMT. Davidi2 is usually there as well thought not many people have posted on this topic, so I can only assume they haven’t read it or simply aren’t interested.

Read full topic

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m out of town for a funeral, but I’ll be back in about 24 hours from now, and I can meet the next night I’m sure.

Read full topic
